titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse under construction in White Plains, New York, as the "Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Designates the U.S. courthouse under construction at 300 Quarropas Street in White Plains, New York, as the Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse.
